doc.title: Anuna: Celtic Origins
doc.plot: ANUNA bridges the gap between classical and popular music creating a style all their own. The unique choral performances included special wardrobes, crystalline voices, candles, beautiful locations and ritualistic movements to create an entrancing 3-D musical experience that envelops and captivates audiences. Although Anuna has toured the globe, this public television special and a concert tour in the fall of 2007, marks their first major tour in the United States.
